Bios.description: The Bios schema contains properties related to the BIOS Attribute Registry.  The Attribute Registry describes the system-specific BIOS attributes and Actions for changing to BIOS settings.  Changes to the BIOS typically require a system reset before they take effect.  It is likely that a client will find the @Redfish.Settings term in this resource, and if it is found, the client makes requests to change BIOS settings by modifying the resource identified by the @Redfish.Settings term.
Bios.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent BIOS attributes for a Redfish implementation.

title: #Bios.Bios
